english.segment1: Fall down. Kiss the ground once again. This mire too often my heart's desire. Pick me up. Dust me off once again. This mire too often my heart's desire.
english.segment2: I create my own shame. Put a muzzle on my mouth when I get so very anxious. So very anxious again.
english.segment3: Better off if things were left unsaid. Tomorrow's sorrows waiting there once again. The silver pinholes of the night. refuse to sing their starry song tonight. Goodnight.goodnight.
english.segment4: [Chorus 2X]. (We always go back, but not this time.)
